translations: 补充，重新装满；补足（原有的量）

sentences.sentence: The cavalry must immediately replenish the new horse.
sentences.translation: 骑兵部队必须立即补充新马。

sentences.sentence: If you replenish the ice sheets and frozen waters of the high latitudes, more light will be reflected back into space, so reducing the warming of the oceans and atmosphere.
sentences.translation: 如果高纬度地区的冰原和冻结的水得到补充，更多的光将被反射回太空，从而减缓海洋和大气的变暖。

sentences.sentence: Allow me to replenish your glass.
